oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Business District
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color photo image of Business district.

“Business District, Memphis, Tennessee, looking north on Second Street. The white-towered building (left) is the 20-story Columbian Mutual Tower Building; the green-roofed brown building (left of center) is the 19-story Exchange Building; the tallest white building (right) is the 29-story Sterick Building”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Second Street; downtown; businesses; business district; Columbian Mutual Tower Building; Exchange Building; Sterick Building; skyscrapers;
